oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: neutrino
detector
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have identified some important and worthwhile physics opportunities with a possible neutrino detector located in India. Particular emphasis is placed on the geographical advantage with a stress on the complimentary aspects with respect to other neutrino detectors already in operation.
